title: Danziger's Travels: Beyond Forbidden Frontiers
description: A bestseller when it was first published nearly a decade ago, Danziger’s Travels is a riveting account of a daring 18–month journey from Istanbul to Peking, written by a young British photographer who walked and hitchhiked his way across six frontiers without a visa. Featuring 40 color photos.
author: Nick Danziger
